label: BTZW125
info_overview:
• Smartlock for easy and fast installation on almost any door
  • Incl. adjustable cylinder
  • No keys required, Operation via Danalock App / Z-Wave
info_inclusion:
To add or include the Danalock into a Z-Wave network

Set the controller in inclusion mode

Push the switch once until you hear two beeps.
info_exclusion:
To exclude the Danalock out off the Z-Wave network

Set the controller in inclusion mode

Push the switch once until you hear two beeps.
category_description: Devices whose primary pupose is locking something

parameters.label: Direction
parameters.overview:
0 -> The motor goes clockwise when latched

1 -> The motor goes counterclockwise when latched

options.label: The motor goes counterclockwise when latched

parameters.label: Mode
parameters.overview:
0 -> Stepper motor mode wave drive(power saving)

1 -> (Default) Stepper motor mode full drive(Normal)

2 -> Relay mode

parameters.label: Turn degrees
parameters.overview: (Default) Factor 10 turn degrees ( 1 = 10 degrees, 9 = 90 degrees etc.)

parameters.label: Auto Latch time
parameters.overview: How many seconds from the lock has been unlatched to it automatically should close again. If 0 then it is disabled.

parameters.label: Sound
parameters.overview: Enable the beep sound from latch or unlatch operations

parameters.label: Battery Type
parameters.overview:
2 -> Mains power, changing from and to mains power requires the Danalock to be excluded and included.

0 -> 3,6 Volt battery

1 -> (Default) 3.0 Volt battery.

parameters.label: Battery alarm
parameters.overview: When the battery level is under this value, the device will notify user with a beep sound after latch or unlatch

parameters.label: TurnAndGo
parameters.overview: using a optional rotation sensor. Latch&Go on will turn automatically when manual turn is detected.

parameters.label: BrakeAndGoBack
parameters.description: Turn 75 degrees back after x seconds
parameters.overview:
0 -> (Default) Disabled

1 to 15 -> Seconds to brake. When used the lock will brake for x amount of seconds and then turn 75 degrees back. Made for special doors without door lever.(Only when unlatching).

options.label: Disabled
options.overview: Disabled

parameters.label: Async
parameters.description: Used if the lock is using an optional rotation sensor
parameters.overview:
0 -> (Default) Async off

1 -> Async on. Used if the lock is using an optional rotation sensor. When async is enabled the lock will auto calibrate if already unlatched and asked to Unlatch again (used for special door locks where the key turn is asynced from the inside nob.)

options.label: Async off
options.overview: Async off

options.label: Async on
options.overview: Async on. Used if the lock is using an optional rotation sensor. When async is enabled the lock will auto calibrate if already unlatched and asked to Unlatch again (used for special door locks where the key turn is asynced from the inside nob.)

parameters.label: ReportType
parameters.overview:
Door lock operation report type

2 -> No Door lock operation reports are sent unsolicited.

0 -> (Default) Simple supported by all controllers that support door locks.

1 -> Advanced, more specific reports through notification Command Class.

commandclass.name: NO_OPERATION
commandclass.label: No Operation - used for PINGing a device.

xml.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<Product>
    <Model>Danalock BTZU125</Model>
    <Label lang="en">Danalock v2 circle</Label>

    <CommandClasses>
        <Class>
            <id>0x00</id>             <!-- NO_OPERATION -->
        </Class>
        <Class>
            <id>0x20</id>             <!-- BASIC -->
        </Class>
        <Class>
            <id>0x22</id>             <!-- APPLICATION_STATUS -->
        </Class>
        <Class>
            <id>0x72</id>             <!-- MANUFACTURER_SPECIFIC -->
        </Class>
        <Class>
            <id>0x80</id>             <!-- BATTERY -->
        </Class>
    </CommandClasses>

    <Configuration>

        <Parameter>
            <Index>1</Index>
            <Label lang="en">Direction</Label>
            <Type>list</Type>
            <Default>0</Default>
            <Minimum>0</Minimum>
            <Maximum>1</Maximum>
            <Size>1</Size>
            <Item>
                <Value>0</Value>
                <Label lang="en">Clockwise</Label>
            </Item>
            <Item>
                <Value>1</Value>
                <Label lang="en">The motor goes counterclockwise when latched</Label>
            </Item>
            <Item>
                <Value>2</Value>
                <Label lang="en">1 second</Label>
            </Item>
        </Parameter>

        <Parameter>
            <Index>10</Index>
            <Label lang="en">BrakeAndGoBack	</Label>
            <Type>list</Type>
            <Default>0</Default>
            <Minimum>0</Minimum>
            <Maximum>15</Maximum>
            <Size>1</Size>
            <Item>
                <Value>0</Value>
                <Label lang="en">Disabled</Label>
            </Item>
            <Item>
                <Value>1</Value>
                <Label lang="en">Brake for 1 second</Label>
            <Item>
				<Value>2</Value>
                <Label lang="en">Brake for 2 seconds</Label>
			</Item>
				<Value>3</Value>
                <Label lang="en">Brake for 3 seconds</Label>
            </Item>
        </Parameter>

        <Parameter>
            <Index>11</Index>
            <Label lang="en">Async</Label>
            <Type>short</Type>
            <Default>0</Default>
            <Minimum>0</Minimum>
            <Maximum>1</Maximum>
            <Size>1</Size>
        </Parameter>

    </Configuration>

</Product>
